show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Dr. <!--more--> Brent Potter is a psychotherapist in the “old” tradition of taking people and life seriously.   We have an in-depth discussion about the roots of profound human suffering and how people heal.   You will feel like you are sitting together with us sharing a thoughtful evening of discussion.
  Join us.
